text: Ana ngankuiona yanti Allah akwinjisyaga chilo mâ€™muusi (ni kuleupa muusi kwipipa chilo mpela ndawi jachitukuta), ni akwinjisyaga soni muusi nchilo (ni kuleupa chilo kwipipa muusi mpela ndawi jakusisima), ni alijepepesye lyuwa ni mwesi chilichose chikwenda kwandawi jekolanjidwe, nambo soni yanti Allah abali syosope sya yankutenda awele Jwasimanya chenene
